name: Wikipedia Search Verification for Artificial Intelligence
description: Validate that searching for 'artificial intelligence' on Wikipedia returns the correct article page, complete with key sections, images, and infoboxes, presented in a professional layout.
requirements: Navigate to the Wikipedia homepage at https://www.wikipedia.org/
In the search input, enter the term "artificial intelligence"
Submit the search by pressing the Enter key
Verify that the user is taken to the "Artificial intelligence" article page
Confirm the presence of the following sections in the article: History, Applications, Ethics
Check that the article contains relevant images
Check that the article includes useful information boxes (infoboxes)
Ensure the overall layout is professional, well-organized, and complete
